modName: Real Undies Dress or Undress (Vanilla CBBE UNP TBBP)
summary: If you use undies version body and would like to be able to UNDRESS it or DRESS undies back WITHOUT swapping BODY MODELS - this mod is for YOU. Compatible with CBBE, UNP, UNPB and Vanilla body meshes (underwear variants) and any BBP / TBBP / HDT mods out there.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HBDhfVj.png[/img]
[center]
[youtube]qy-jYTebQ6A[/youtube][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/COndQJL.png[/img]
If you use undies version body and would like to be able to UNDRESS it or DRESS undies back WITHOUT swapping BODY MODELS - this mod is for YOU. Compatible with CBBE, UNP, Vanilla body meshes (underwear variants) and any BBP / TBBP / HDT mods out there and all follower mods like AFT, EFF or UFO.

Why you must choose between fully naked body model and not so naked? Now dilemma is solved. This mod adds a dialogue to all female NPC in the game except children. Using dialogue you can ask NPC to dress or undress her undies. She will stay with / without undies until you'll ask her to switch back again.

Mod is fully "voiced" using vanilla voices.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/3Kqu795.png[/img]
This mod is compatible with any other mod. It only adds new scripts / quest and does not interfere with any vanilla / modded parts of the game.

[b]Mod will work with AFT, EFF or UFO.[/b]

[b]Mod will work with CBBE (any undies variant), UNP (any undies variant) and Vanilla.[/b]

[b]Mod is also absolutely compatible with any BBP / TBBP / HDT mods[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/zmMRube.png[/img]
This mod ONLY requires SKSE to function.

Minimum SKSE version is 1.7.0 with which mod was created. However according to SKSE history, version as low as 1.6.1 may work.

[b]ALWAYS USE LATEST VERSION FROM [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]http://skse.silverlock.org[/url][/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/YlUKHCJ.png[/img]
Use mod manager to automatically install mod. No manual work required.

OR

Install manually, just copy ESP and BSA files to Data folder in your Skyrim directory, then enable ESP file.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/n2dPF7g.png[/img]
Use mod manager to automatically uninstall mod. No manual work required.

OR

Uninstall manually, just remode ESP and BSA files from Data folder in your Skyrim directory, then disable ESP file.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4QCnsj.png[/img]
No serious issues were found during testing.

If you unequip something from NPC's Chest slot, script will try to preserve your preference, you may notice that undies are back for a moment. This is due to Skyrim events system and cannot be fixed as of yet. This may be fixed if SKSE team will add more sophisticated functions to manage NIF file which is in progress according to the new versions of SKSE. For now, script will memorize up to 25 NPCs undressed states, if you go over this limit you still can undress unlimited number of NPCs, BUT their state will not be memorized thus after unequiping chest slot undies will be dressed back automatically.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/uLyfvZP.png[/img]
v1.2 - added support for player (female characters only) and UNPB support
v1.0 - initial release

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9U3S2xp.png[/img]
Thanks to Caliente for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] and ESPECIALLY for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url];
To dimon99 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url];
To Migal because I used his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11427/?]Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite[/url] for screenshots;
To Nivea because I used his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks[/url] for screenshots;
To Hello Santa because I used his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] for screenshots;


To SKSE team for [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url];

And off-course Bethesda for a fantastic game!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/s5cmCmr.png[/img]
1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55355/?]Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade - Breezhome Fully Upgradable Compatibility Patch[/url]
